event: I screwed up a task at work
thought: I make mistakes in my work all the time, everyone around me hates me for it
body: Increased heart palpitations, heaviness in the chest.
response: There are no people who don't make mistakes, and I can't predict the thoughts of those around me
conclusion: The next time I make a mistake, I will not try to guess the reaction of others. I will also keep a checklist to check my work so that I don't make the same mistake again
